page.title: 10A school day in Guildford
page.content: I arrive at school at 8.45 a.m. and play in the playground with my friends until the whistle goes at 9.00. After registration we usually have English, but today we had a rehearsal for our special end of term{assembly}play. At 10.40 we had a fifteen minute break in the playground. After play it was mathematics until lunch at 12.00. I had a{school dinner}with 75 other children in the school hall. (127 children bring sandwiches, which are also eaten in the hall and 6 children go home for lunch). School lunch was cold turkey and chips, followed by butterscotch tart. Afterwards I played football with my friends on the field until 1.30 p.m. During the afternoon we did follow-up work for our{residential visit}to York which had taken place earlier in the term. School ended at 3.15 p.m.
